description: Lists aggregated finding data for your environment based on specific criteria.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account IDs to retrieve finding aggregation data for. (dict) --- An object that describes the details of a string filter. The operator to use when comparing values in the filter. The value to filter on.

nested_params.name: comparison
nested_params.description: The operator to use when comparing values in the filter.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value to filter on.

parameters.name: aggregationRequest
parameters.description: Details of the aggregation request that is used to filter your aggregation results. accountAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon Web Services account IDs. findingType (string) --- The type of finding. resourceType (string) --- The type of resource. sortBy (string) --- The value to sort by. sortOrder (string) --- The sort order (ascending or descending). amiAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon Machine Images (AMIs). amis (list) --- The IDs of AMIs to aggregate findings for. (dict) --- An object that describes the details of a string filter. The operator to use when comparing values in the filter. The value to filter on. sortBy (string) --- The value to sort results by. sortOrder (string) --- The order to sort results by. awsEcrContainerAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon ECR container images. architectures (list) --- The architecture of the containers. imageShas (list) --- The image SHA values. imageTags (list) --- The image tags. repositories (list) --- The container repositories. resourceIds (list) --- The container resource IDs. ec2InstanceAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon EC2 instances. amis (list) --- The AMI IDs associated with the Amazon EC2 instances to aggregate findings for. instanceIds (list) --- The Amazon EC2 instance IDs to aggregate findings for. instanceTags (list) --- The Amazon EC2 instance tags to aggregate findings for. (dict) --- An object that describes details of a map filter. The tag key used in the filter. value (string) --- The tag value used in the filter. operatingSystems (list) --- The operating system types to aggregate findings for. Valid values must be uppercase and underscore separated, examples are ORACLE_LINUX_7 and ALPINE_LINUX_3_8. findingTypeAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on finding types. findingType (string) --- The finding type to aggregate. resourceType (string) --- The resource type to aggregate. imageLayerAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on container image layers. layerHashes (list) --- The hashes associated with the layers. repositories (list) --- The repository associated with the container image hosting the layers. resourceIds (list) --- The ID of the container image layer. lambdaFunctionAggregation (dict) --- Returns an object with findings aggregated by Amazon Web Services Lambda function. functionNames (list) --- The Amazon Web Services Lambda function names to include in the aggregation results. functionTags (list) --- The tags to include in the aggregation results. resourceIds (list) --- The resource IDs to include in the aggregation results. runtimes (list) --- Returns findings aggregated by Amazon Web Services Lambda function runtime environments. sortBy (string) --- The finding severity to use for sorting the results. sortOrder (string) --- The order to use for sorting the results. lambdaLayerAggregation (dict) --- Returns an object with findings aggregated by Amazon Web Services Lambda layer. functionNames (list) --- The names of the Amazon Web Services Lambda functions associated with the layers. layerArns (list) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Lambda function layer. resourceIds (list) --- The resource IDs for the Amazon Web Services Lambda function layers. packageAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on operating system package type. packageNames (list) --- The names of packages to aggregate findings on. repositoryAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon ECR repositories. repositories (list) --- The names of repositories to aggregate findings on. titleAggregation (dict) --- An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on finding title. findingType (string) --- The type of finding to aggregate on. resourceType (string) --- The resource type to aggregate on. titles (list) --- The finding titles to aggregate on. vulnerabilityIds (list) --- The vulnerability IDs of the findings. The value to filter on.

nested_items.description: The type of aggregation to perform.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to use for paginating results that are returned in the response. Set the value of this parameter to null for the first request to a list action. For subsequent calls, use the NextToken value returned from the previous request to continue listing results after the first page.

nested_items.name: responses
nested_items.description: Objects that contain the results of an aggregation operation.
